snippet.title: Arena: Cyber Evolution - Fall Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Arena: Cyber Evolution, the world's first MOSA (multiplayer online sports arena), is now running on dedicated servers! Get it on Steam Early Access for FREE: http://store.steampowered.com/app/285580/

After months of debugging, the game plays better than ever. Give it a try for free on Steam Early Access for an unique competitive multiplayer experience.

Help us make the game better by leaving your feedback and ideas on the Steam Forums. Play with us and discuss every weekday nights at 7PM Eastern at http://www.twitch.tv/spearheadgames.

Support the continued production of the game by going to http://www.spearheadgames.ca/cyber/support/. Thanks!

http://www.spearheadgames.ca
http://www.twitter.com/SpearheadMtl
https://www.facebook.com/ArenaCyberEvolution
https://www.facebook.com/SpearheadMtl
